record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3995
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3995 -- (House of Representatives - September 15, 2008)

[Page: H8097]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to have my name removed as a cosponsor to H.R. 3995.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from New Hampshire?
